name: Learnthemonths
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learn the months
des:
It is time to learn the months of the year!

There are two modes; practice and challenge. Practice mode will ask you to repeat the months back and move on to the next one in the sequence. Challenge mode will will ask you to say each month in the correct order one at a time.

The order of the months is something that adults take for granted, but it requires regular practice for kids to know the month order. This skill is a fun way for kids to build this knowledge.

Privacy information
No personal information is collected by this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
